I received the two that I purchased the other day.  They look great!  Thanks again on the deal.  Sorry to hear your other buyer fell through.
Are all the one still marked SOLD gone or available?

[quote name="ruth-gehrig" post=1665239]Are all the one still marked SOLD gone or available?[/QUOTE]

Wondering the same as he said relisted???

I will take the Dummy Taylor if it is available.

[quote name="Joshchisox08" post=1665244]Wondering the same as he said relisted???

I will take the Dummy Taylor if it is available.[/QUOTE]

The ones marked sold are sold. When I reached out to the seller earlier I grabbed a few that weren't marked and now they are marked sold.

Apologies for any confusion.  The cards marked "SOLD" are sold to Net54'ers who've responded to the re-listing of the cards.

I've removed the original explanation to avoid any further confusion.
Got my cards today. Thanks Jamie!
